name: Ghouler Ruler
description:
Ghouler Ruler is a strategy game featuring zombies, monsters, and ghosts. Take turns attacking until the enemy is defeated. Upgrade units after each round. New unit tiers are unlocked before each new level. The game features 4 levels with 12 rounds total. Use the mouse to click for controller, click end turn after moving and attacking. Click your unit and then an enemy to attack! 

 

Listen to the OST here:

https://youtu.be/Uh_72knx1fU
